title: League shop working incorrectly
body:
Recently my shop had a bug where upon clicking the store, everything would work fine but champions, runes etc that I didn't have enough IP for still showed up as me having enough. When I click "Purchase", nothing happens at all. The problem is still happening several weeks later. I've logged onto my account on a friend's computer, and my shop worked fine so it has to be an issue with my computer.
Please help my precious IP needs spending ;_;.

replies.body: So wait, in addition to purchases not being completed if you don't have enough IP, you're also not able to complete the purchase even if you have enough IP? If so, could you provide a screenshot of the exact point you're getting stuck at?
